prompts.title: Vacation/holiday
questions: In past holidays, I usually start feeling guilty when...
When guilt shows up, I usually respond by...
This year I want to respond by...
This year, the kind of person I want to be is...
Being present for me looks like... (talking more, sitting down, laughing, listening...)
When I notice myself drifting or checking out, I will return to present by... (asking a question, taking a breath, focusing on the conversation, noticing the food)
